```{r}
openaq <- read_delim("openaq(1).csv", 
    ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
head(openaq)

sp_pollutants_2017 <- openaq %>%
  as_data_frame %>%
  filter(openaq$City== "Sao Paulo")

Sp_2017_table <- arrange(sp_pollutants_2017) 
```

```{r}
formattable(Sp_2017_table, 
            align = c("l",rep("r", NCOL(Sp_2017_table) - 1)),
            list(`City` = formatter("span", style = ~ style(color = "green", font.weight = "bold")),
                 `Value` = formatter("span",
                                           style = x ~ style(color = ifelse(x < 70, "green", "red")))))
```
